activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8142
activity.text:
- Go to user tab, by clicking on the sidebar
- Search for the user id
- Click linked facilities button in the respective user card
- click the red button in the same row of the facility name , you click on that
- You will receive a successful notification to confirm unlinking is done

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8016
activity.text:
@UdaySagar-Git 

**General Description**
---

- [ ] Modify the PR description properly to understand, what are covered specifically in this PR point by point so that the review will be easier, for example when we read:  File Upload Option (partially) in the description, we are not sure, which is completed and which are under development.

**Compared Review Based on Proposal till July 7th**
---

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/ca4bc3b8-520f-436c-bf79-0dd567b566b9)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/194388fb-949b-484a-8ba4-63274d5b1726)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/87fa23bb-43b0-4b2c-ad2c-e34d2bfb6bcf)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/468cb0b3-722f-44c8-8f1e-0a9efd0243a2)


### Action Item of the Week 
---
- [ ] Implementing Markdown with full functionality
- [ ] Adding support to embed, preview, and copy-paste images
- [ ] Implement the tagging mechanism of users
- [ ] Implement the preview mode for hyperlinked links
- [ ] Introduce the file upload support in the doctor's notes
- [ ] Make necessary changes to support bookmark in various categories
- [ ] Fully implementing support of file, audio, and camera capture (By July 21st)


### Test Report ( In Progress )
---

#####  Markdown with full functionality

-

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#8016
activity.text:
@UdaySagar-Git 

- [ ] the cypress is failing, fix it

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/5f29e46f-ab28-4010-84a8-9760de587142)

- [ ] the warning message for mike looks weirds always present in the UI, it is fine with file upload component, but in this space it doesn't look good, try to think of a better UI to place in her in the chat

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/c0dc0604-072c-497c-87db-82625d7ddf56)

- [ ] the attached image or audio files are not been attached to the chat.

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/1e485c49-7b05-46e9-8644-ab18e203dbbf)

- [ ] you are reusing the voice recording component here, it doesnt go with the UI , think of a better UI

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/dc18b91c-a3a4-4e9c-8462-1fed62c7a54d)

- [ ] when a invalid file type is upload, the chat space is not restore the state, it is still showing 100% uploaded all the time
- [ ] rather than showing invalid file type, mention more user friendly error message

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/77c03982-8dfa-4625-95d5-c82b064b070b)

- [ ] i can't remove applied bold or italic or any mark editor to the text, by again clicking on that particular icon

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/b344872f-1aef-49c6-a71d-654dbdbd3a8f)

- [ ] when i apply a mark editor , the text is modified instantly but to see the highlight of any applied mark's i need to click outside the icons.
